metadata.title: CVE-2013-3564 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: The web interface in VideoLAN VLC media player before 2.0.7 has no accesscontrol which allows remote attackers to view directory listings via the'dir' command or issue other commands without authenticating.

criterions.comment: vlc: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
